title: Besties 10th Anniversary Game of the Decade Spectacular
description: To celebrate our tenth year of intractable debate over which video games are better than the other video games, we're doing EXACTLY THAT. For over an hour. We're pitting the best games of the last decade against one another, and only ONE survives. (One game, we mean. All the hosts are doing just fine.)
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante)
